briefdescription.para: where we like to be
Prolog discovered the problem.
The problem was found before the system can cope.
C-helper like must_ found out the problem.
C-builtin crashed.
user code crashed
ok, we put a throw to be dispatched
someone caught it
error became an exception (usually SWIG bridge)
handle error in Prolog
Error stages since it was initially processed.

detaileddescription.para: Notice that some of the stages may be active simultaneouly

briefdescription.para: add a new error descriptor, either to the top of the stack, or as the top;

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *file, const char *function, int lineno, YAP_Term t, int sno, TokEntry *start, TokEntry *err, char *s,...)
memberdef.name: Yap_syntax_error__
JMP_LOCAL_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (H + 2 * (v) > ASP - 1024) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_STACK; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = 2 * (v) * sizeof(CELL); \ goto LAB; \ }

memberdef.name: LOCAL_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (HR + (v) > ASP - 1024) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_STACK; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = 2 * (v) * sizeof(CELL); \ return NULL; \ }

memberdef.name: LOCAL_TERM_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (HR + (v) > ASP - 1024) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_STACK; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = 2 * (v) * sizeof(CELL); \ return 0L; \ }

memberdef.name: AUX_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (s + (n + 1) > (TYPE *)AuxSp) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_AUXILIARY_STACK; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = n * sizeof(TYPE); \ return NULL; \ }

memberdef.name: AUX_TERM_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (s + (n + 1) > (TYPE *)AuxSp) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_AUXILIARY_STACK; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = n * sizeof(TYPE); \ return 0L; \ }

memberdef.name: JMP_AUX_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (s + (n + 1) > (TYPE *)AuxSp) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_AUXILIARY_STACK; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = n * sizeof(TYPE); \ goto LAB; \ }

memberdef.name: HEAP_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (a == NIL) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_HEAP; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = n * sizeof(TYPE); \ return NULL; \ }

memberdef.name: HEAP_TERM_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (a == NIL) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_HEAP; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = n * sizeof(TYPE); \ return 0L; \ }

memberdef.name: JMP_HEAP_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: if (a == NIL) { \ LOCAL_Error_TYPE = RESOURCE_ERROR_HEAP; \ LOCAL_Error_Size = n * sizeof(TYPE); \ goto LAB; \ }
